sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Card, ListGroup, Button, Form, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' import Category from './Category' const Food = ({food}) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(0) const a = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9] return ( {food.name} ${food.price} Qty setQty(e.target.value)}> {a.map((x) => ())} ) } export default Food
